ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: We weren t strong enough to make it to the warden, we tried twice with fairly lehtal results.  (The first involved fighting 8 blue froggies, a battle we should
ygData.messageBody:
We weren't strong enough to make it to the warden, we tried twice with
fairly lehtal results. (The first involved fighting 8 blue froggies, a
battle we should have won but the bard panicked and called Run). The
squire is alaways camped on Veeshan (at least he has been every time I
looked). We could have camped him after waiting a while, but then we
would have lost the sryer camp (they aren't very close). OUr plan is to
try for squire this week.
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
